data: The fact that much he said, because of his unconscionable slang, was incomprehensible did not take from the charm of his conversation as far as the Duchess of Breakwater was concerned.
Van Vorst, Marie, 1867-1936; Cootes, F. Graham (Frank Graham), 1879-1960 [Illustrator]
